title: Changing date on device
custom_expected:
1. User does not see the end of the game flow if seen already
2. User's XP level doesn't go up
3. User is unable to make predictions for the games 
4. User sees the leaderboard for this day

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. Sign up a new user
2. Quit the app
3. Open the app
custom_steps_separated.expected: User stays logged in and Game tab opens

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. Sign up a new user
2. Make predictions for the game
3. Quit the app
4. Open the app
custom_steps_separated.expected: User stays logged in and Game tab opens

title: User's position after six digits (000,000)
custom_expected:
The font size for the user's position in daily and game rankings get smaller with 7 characters and more

![](index.php?/attachments/get/34187)

title: Updating DOB/nickname
custom_expected: Rally should not let users play with no DOB and nickname

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. Log in with existing Rally user
2. Go to Profile -> Account -> User will be taken to mlb.com
3. Delete the info for nickname and DOB field
4. Log out from Rally
5. Log back in
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Update and Log in page is displayed after user puts info in Log in page

![](index.php?/attachments/get/1677074)

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. Create an account on mlb.com
2. Create a user under 21 yo
3. Log in to Rally
custom_steps_separated.expected:
User is not able to proceed to the app

![](index.php?/attachments/get/1709145)

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. Create an account on mlb.com
2. Create a user over 21 yo
3. Do not create a nickname 
4. Log in to Rally
5. Confirm the DOB
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Update and Log in page is displayed after user puts info in Log in page. Rally treats the user as over 21
Nickname field does not have any input and grayed out. 
The Update & Log In button is disabled until user puts the nickname

![](index.php?/attachments/get/1709147)

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. Create an account on mlb.com
2. Create a user over 21 yo
3. Do not create a nickname 
4. Log in to Rally
5. Once you are navigated to the Update Account screen, close out the app
5. Reopen the app
custom_steps_separated.expected:
User is navigated back to the Update Account page

![](index.php?/attachments/get/1709147)

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. Create an account on mlb.com
2. Create a user over 21 yo
3. Create a nickname 
4. Log in to Rally
5. Confirm the DOB
custom_steps_separated.expected: User is logged in and Update and Log in page is not displayed

title: Updating DOB/nickname  - fields should be prepopulated
custom_steps:
1. Go to your mlb account
2. Delete DOB OR Nickname
3. Log in to Rally
custom_expected: Updated Your Account page shows empty field for the info that user deleted on MLB account and the other field is prepopulated.

custom_steps_separated.content: Delete the nickname from MLB account and log in to Rally and the DOB should be prepopulated and nickname is empty
Delete all DOB (day, month, year) from MLB account and log in to Rally and the nickname should be prepopulated and DOB should be empty
Delete year and month of DOB from MLB account and log in to Rally and the nickname should be prepopulated and DOB should be empty
Delete nickname and DOB from MLB account and log in to Rally and both of the fields should be empty

title: Top winners for >21 y.o user
custom_steps:
1. Play the game and make sure user is in Top 3 in the leaderboard
2. Log in the next day (when user turns 21)
3. Go to the leaderboard - yesterday tab
custom_expected: User us in top 3 but not in the winner's section
